channel.title: Making a button clickable
channel.description:
how do I make this clickable? ^.^ or is this client sided?
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/14no136.jpg[/img]

item.title: Making a button clickable
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:9, topic:413765”][quote author=Coelho link=topic=515726.msg3742430#msg3742430 date=1315460719]
If the server isn’t sending the interface id, it still will be clickable, but will have a blank interface.
[/quote]
that also might depend on the client >.>’ if interfaceID==-1 !open =] or how ever clients do their duties…[/quote]
I’m giving the assumption he is using a client that is either a deob, or has not edited this aspect (which they shouldn’t)

Read full topic

item.title: Making a button clickable
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Coelho:

If the server isn’t sending the interface id, it still will be clickable, but will have a blank interface.

that also might depend on the client >.>’ if interfaceID==-1 !open =] or how ever clients do their duties…

item.title: Making a button clickable
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:6, topic:413765”][quote author=matzie link=topic=515726.msg3741360#msg3741360 date=1315371258]
when you hover over it does it say Ok or somthing in the top right corner?
[/quote]
Of course not. [quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=515726.msg3741303#msg3741303 date=1315364249]
You’d have to add a Sidebar Interface for it, then add the addSideBarInterface(Id,number); under initialize I believe?
[/quote]
That’s only on Galkon’s.

Edit: Which he’s probably using because he found a tutorial on how to add the sidebar interface. My bad.[/quote]

and my bad, i meant top left corner o.o (if you hover over inventory tab it says Ok for it, or like if you right click it or somthing) if it is the server not sending the interface id i dont know if the client lets it be clickable, but not openable or what the deal is o.o

Read full topic

item.title: Making a button clickable
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

matzie:

when you hover over it does it say Ok or somthing in the top right corner?

Of course not. [quote=“imsuperman05, post:3, topic:413765”]You’d have to add a Sidebar Interface for it, then add the addSideBarInterface(Id,number); under initialize I believe?[/quote]
That’s only on Galkon’s.

Edit: Which he’s probably using because he found a tutorial on how to add the sidebar interface. My bad.
